urls.description: Coronavirus Updates (COVID-19) Deaths & Cases per Population | RealClearPolitics

text:
@CBSNews Andrew Cuomo is America's #1 governor.

In COVID deaths, I mean.

COVID deaths per 1M residents:
1) NJ: 1757.3
2) NY: 1665.7
3) CT: 1219.5
USA: 421.2
15) AZ: 307.3
18) GA: 282.6
25) FL: 197.5
37) TX: 113.2
